u.a: videotape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audiotape

CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi play well together pleasantly. The activity is almost entirely dedicated to building various structures , and there is very little discussion of the scientific properties of magnets , in fact there is very little discussion in general. Mot does test to see if a penny sticks , but that is the extent of experimentation

u.a: videotape starts here

The big magnet , with the metal plate (a .k .a flat silver circle) affixed to the middle of it , is at the center of the table , directly in front of Chi . There are three of the silver men at the center of the big magnet , stacked standing on each others' shoulders making a tower three figures high . Other objects lie scattered around the table . Chi has some of the metal figures in his right hand .
MOT picks up the big magnet and lifts it up a bit , looking underneath
pauses to straighten the three magnetic balls into a line beside him on the table before reaching for the big magnet again
puts a fourth silver man on top of the three already on the big magnet
reaches in the direction of the magnetic balls but stops short
affixes a fifth silver man onto the tower
detaches the yellow ball from the line of magnetic balls and places it on top of the tower
the ball falls off and knocks the top two figures off the tower
